headline.print_headline: New Diversity Council Led by El Rey
headline.main: El Rey Cable Network Is Forming Diversity Council

snippet: The English-language network aimed at second- and third-generation Latinos is spearheading a diversity council to address the lack of Latinos in media.
abstract: The English-language network aimed at second- and third-generation Latinos is spearheading a diversity council to address the lack of Latinos in media.
